Script.ScriptSource:
MQDadRef.Enable SetStage MQ05 10
; check on and react to Mutant residents @ project Purity if MQ03.bodyCount < 14 ; Kill any Purity resident mutants in PPurity01 and PPurity03 MQ03Mutant01.kill MQ03Mutant02.kill MQ03Mutant09.kill MQ03Mutant10.kill MQ03Mutant11.kill MQ03Mutant12.kill MQ03Mutant13.kill MQ03Mutant14.kill
; Check for any errant wanderers, send home if MQ03Mutant03.getInCell PPurity02== 0 MQ03Mutant03.moveTo MQ05ControlRoomMarkTEMP endif if MQ03Mutant04.getInCell PPurity02 == 0 MQ03Mutant04.moveTo MQ05ControlRoomMarkTEMP endif if MQ03Mutant05.getInCell PPurity02 == 0 MQ03Mutant05.moveTo MQ05ControlRoomMarkTEMP endif if MQ03Mutant06.getInCell PPurity02 == 0 MQ03Mutant06.moveTo MQ05ControlRoomMarkTEMP endif if MQ03Mutant07.getInCell PPurity02 == 0 MQ03Mutant07.moveTo MQ05ControlRoomMarkTEMP endif if MQ03Mutant08.getInCell PPurity02 == 0 MQ03Mutant08.moveTo MQ05ControlRoomMarkTEMP endif MQ03MutantEnableMarker.Disable if ( MQ03.BodyCount < 8 ) set MQ03.Bodycount to 8 endif endif
;this stage set to allow Dad's dialogue immediately upon leaving Tranquility Lane
setstage mq05 60 mqdadref.enable mqdadref.moveto player janicekaplinskiref.moveto player doctorliref.moveto player
SetObjectiveDisplayed MQ05 10 1 DoctorLiRef.Moveto ScienceLabMarker ; TTW sesom see questscript for changelog. if ( MQ05.TTWBridgeOpend != 1 ) set RCExBridge1Ref.bForceOpen to 1 endif

if ( MQ03.Bodycount >= 14 ) MQ05PReexistingTurret.disable AlexDargonRef.Enable DanielAgincourtRef.Enable endif if ( MQ03.BodyCount < 14 ) Set MQ05.AllClear to 1 endif SetObjectiveCompleted MQ05 10 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed MQ05 20 1 ShowMap PPMapMarker
SetObjectiveCompleted MQ05 20 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed MQ05 25 1
SetObjectiveCompleted MQ05 25 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed MQ05 26 1
SetObjectiveCompleted MQ05 26 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed MQ05 27 1 AlexDargonRef.Enable DanielAgincourtRef.Enable JaniceKaplinskiRef.EVP GarzaRef.EVP AnnaHoltRef.EVP DoctorLiRef.EVP

SetObjectiveCompleted MQ05 20 1
SetObjectiveCompleted MQ05 27 1
SetObjectiveDisplayed MQ05 30 1
MQ05LabMoved.Disable

; Remove Lyons Pride NPCs from GNR faction (so they don't pick up GNR dialogue) MQ01SarahRef.removefromfaction MQ01BrotherhoodDCFaction MQ01VargasREF.removefromfaction MQ01BrotherhoodDCFaction MQ01ReddinREF.removefromfaction MQ01BrotherhoodDCFaction MQ01ColvinREF.removefromfaction MQ01BrotherhoodDCFaction
SetObjectiveCompleted MQ05 30 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed MQ05 40 1
SetObjectiveCompleted MQ05 40 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed MQ05 50 1
SetObjectiveCompleted MQ05 50 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed MQ05 60 1
SetObjectiveCompleted MQ05 60 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed MQ05 65 1
SetObjectiveCompleted MQ05 65 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed MQ05 70 1 PPMapMarker.disable

SetObjectiveCompleted MQ05 70 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed MQ05 75 1
;set up Autumn scene in Control room
MQ05EnclaveTroopsMarker.enable if ( DanielAgincourtRef.GetDead == 0 ) DanielAgincourtRef.Moveto MQ05TaftTunnelStartMark endif if ( AlexDargonRef.GetDead == 0 ) AlexDargonRef.Moveto MQ05TaftTunnelStartMark endif if ( GarzaRef.GetDead == 0 ) GarzaRef.Moveto MQ05TaftTunnelStartMark endif JaniceKaplinskiRef.Moveto MQ05Stage75JaniceMarker MQDadRef.Moveto MQ05Stage75DadMarker DoctorLiRef.Moveto MQ05DoctorLiStage75Marker MQ05EnclaveGoon1.Enable MQ05EnclaveGoon2.Enable MQ05ColonelAutumnRef.Enable if ( AnnaHoltRef.GetDead == 0 ) AnnaHoltRef.Moveto MQ09AnnaMarker endif
;if player has left anyone waiting in the control room, kill 'em
if ( JerichoRef.GetDistance MQ05Radiation2 <= 560 ) JerichoRef.Kill endif if ( RL3REF.GetDistance MQ05Radiation2 <= 560 ) RL3Ref.Kill endif if ( CloverRef.GetDistance MQ05Radiation2 <= 560 ) CloverRef.Kill endif if ( DogmeatRef.GetDistance MQ05Radiation2 <= 560 ) DogmeatRef.Kill endif if ( ButchRef.GetDistance MQ05Radiation2 <= 560 ) ButchRef.Kill endif if ( CharonRef.GetDistance MQ05Radiation2 <= 560 ) CharonRef.Kill endif if ( MS15SydneyRef.GetDistance MQ05Radiation2 <= 560 ) MS15SydneyRef.Kill endif if ( StickyRef.GetDistance MQ05Radiation2 <= 560 ) StickyRef.Kill endif if ( RedRef.GetDistance MQ05Radiation2 <= 560 ) RedRef.Kill endif if ( ShortyRef.GetDistance MQ05Radiation2 <= 560 ) ShortyRef.Kill endif if ( CherryRef.GetDistance MQ05Radiation2 <= 560 ) CherryRef.Kill endif if ( VictoriaWattsRef.GetDistance MQ05Radiation2 <= 560 ) VictoriaWattsRef.Kill endif if ( CraigBooneREF.GetDistance MQ05Radiation2 <= 560 ) CraigBooneREF.Kill endif if ( RoseofSharonCassidyREF.GetDistance MQ05Radiation2 <= 560 ) RoseofSharonCassidyREF.Kill endif if ( VeronicaREF.GetDistance MQ05Radiation2 <= 560 ) VeronicaREF.Kill endif if ( LilyREF.GetDistance MQ05Radiation2 <= 560 ) LilyREF.Kill endif if ( RaulREF.GetDistance MQ05Radiation2 <= 560 ) RaulREF.Kill endif if ( ArcadeREF.GetDistance MQ05Radiation2 <= 560 ) ArcadeREF.Kill endif if ( EDE1Ref.GetDistance MQ05Radiation2 <= 560 ) EDE1Ref.Kill endif if ( EDE2Ref.GetDistance MQ05Radiation2 <= 560 ) EDE2Ref.Kill endif if ( EDE3Ref.GetDistance MQ05Radiation2 <= 560 ) EDE3Ref.Kill endif if ( RexREF.GetDistance MQ05Radiation2 <= 560 ) RexREF.Kill endif

; Joel - enable Enclave energy fence around Purity EnclavePurityDefensesMarker.enable EnclavePurityDefensesForcefieldsMarker.enable MQ05VertibirdLandREF.disable Mq05VertibirdLandREF02.disable EnablePlayerControls TaftExitRef.Unlock TaftEntranceRef.Unlock SetObjectiveCompleted MQ05 75 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed MQ05 80 1 SetStage MQ01LD 150

SetObjectiveCompleted MQ05 80 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed MQ05 85 1 FFEnclaveEncampmentMasterREF.enable EnclaveCamp11DeathClawCollision.enable GarzaRef.EVP DanielAgincourtRef.EVP AlexDargonRef.EVP MQ05TaftToPPurityLadderRef.Lock 255 ElderLyonsRef.Moveto MQ05ElderLyonsMarker ElderLyonsRef.EVP MQ01SarahRef.Moveto MQ05SarahLyonsMarker MQ01SarahRef.EVP
SetObjectiveDisplayed MQ05 90 1
SetObjectiveCompleted MQ05 90 1 Player.SetFactionRank MQPlayerBOSAllyFaction 0

Entry.LogEntry: Escort Doctor Li inside the Citadel.

Script.ScriptSource: SetObjectiveCompleted MQ05 85 1 MQ05ColonelAutumnRef.Disable StopQuest MQ05 Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.MQ04Clear to 0 Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.MQ05Clear to ( GameDaysPassed + 1 ) Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitReady to 1 StartQuest MQ06 SetStage MQ06 0 ;addachievement 08 MQDadRef.Disable JaniceKaplinskiRef.Disable MQ05EnclaveGoon1.Disable MQ05EnclaveGoon2.Disable RewardXP 700

Objective.Description: Join the scientists at Project Purity.
Go to the Rivet City Science Lab.
Turn on the Flood Control Pump Power.
Escort Doctor Li to the evacuation point.
Escort Doctor Li through Taft Tunnel to the Citadel.
Escort Doctor Li through Taft Tunnel to the Citadel.
Clear Project Purity of any remaining Mutant threat.
Escort the scientists inside Project Purity.
Tell Dad it's safe to enter Project Purity.
Speak with Dad over the intercom.
